column5: I guess Harry Morgan is gone today at age 96  I was a fan
I just heard this news too...was one of my favourite characters on MASH.
Was my fav of all the MASH actors. 96 years,thats a life. RIP  http://www.usatoday.com/life/people/obit/story/2011-12-07/harry-morgan-mash/51706432/1
"Horse Hacky"  "Thats just a tiptoe through the tulips for an old farm boy like me." I loved that guy RIP Colonel Sheman T. Potter
My favorite comedy, he will be missed.

Watched him as a kid in December Bride with Spring Byington..and his role for a while with Jack Webb on Dragnet....I remember in MASH..he had been a cavalry officer and when his Jeep sputtered, he drew his service revolver and shot it.  RIP
O no that a shame he will be missed by many.   Art
ANOTHER LITTLE PIECE OF LIFE GONE...HE WAS GREAT ON MASH...96 WOW RIP
GREAT ACTOR and even a better man....rest in peace sir.....  Bob
wow 96, I would have guessed he died long ago. Hopefully they were a good, full 96 for the Colonel
I heard this this morning also, RIP Col. Potter....    RED
Also played in a couple movies I liked in a supporting role  The Shootist--alongside The Duke  And Support your local Sherriff--with James Garner
